sentences.en: He has a facile imagination in writing.
He has a ready and facile pen.
sentences.cn: 他这人文思敏捷,文笔流畅.

sentences.en: He proposed a facile solution to a complex problem.
sentences.cn: 他对一复杂问题提出了肤浅的解决办法.

sentences.en: Her facile nature adapted herself to any company.
sentences.cn: 她的随和天性使她能与任何人相处.

sentences.en: Her facile nature adapted itself to any company.
sentences.cn: 她的随和的天性使她能与任何人相处.

sentences.en: His writing lacks depth for being facile.
sentences.cn: 他的作品因轻易写出,而缺少深度.

sentences.en: I am of a peculiar disposition - I own that - far from facile, without address , in some points eccentric.
sentences.cn: 我承认,我是个性格怪僻的人,决不是容易亲近的, 不会应酬, 在某些方面,行为乖张.

sentences.en: In this special field she is facile princeps, and has left all competitors behind.
sentences.cn: 在这一特定领域里她是出类拔萃的, 并使所有的竞争者都落后于她.
那是一次很容易得到的胜利.

sentences.en: The facile answer is a multimethod approach.
sentences.cn: 最方便的答案是多种方法的普查.

sentences.en: The subject of racism is admittedly too complex for facile summarization.
sentences.cn: 无可否认，种族主义这个话题太过复杂，不可能一言蔽之。

sentences.en: They are also of interest in disabusing our minds of the tyranny of certain facile generalizations.
sentences.cn: 它们还可以使我们的头脑摆脱某些轻率的结论的束缚.

sentences.en: This approach provides a facile route to prepare magnetite nanoparticles.
sentences.cn: 此策略为制备磁性纳米颗粒提供了一种便利的途径.

trans.tran_cn: 轻率作出的，不动脑筋的，轻易可得的，容易做出的
trans.tran_en: a facile achievement or success has been obtained too easily and has no value
